short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes all references to Yair Lapid from facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of seeing people discuss Yair Lapid on your facebook feed? Decided for some reason unfriending them is not the right thing to do? This extension is for you! 
After installing this, every post mentioning Lapid on your feed will be replaced by a nice and soothing picture of some pretty landscape, taken from recent flickr uploads. Clicking on the image will bring the original post back, at your own risk.
